Oasis Golf La Finca: Your Complete Guide to Frontline Golf Living in Algorfa

Imagine waking up to panoramic views of one of Costa Blanca's premier golf courses, stepping onto your private terrace with morning coffee as the Spanish sun rises over perfectly manicured greens. This isn't a dreamâ€”it's daily life at Oasis Golf La Finca, an exclusive new build development bringing modern Mediterranean living to the heart of La Finca Golf Resort in Algorfa.

Oasis Golf La Finca offers 40 contemporary apartments across two phases, combining frontline golf course location with resort-style amenities and turnkey convenience. Developed by Contrimar, a builder with over 20 years of experience in Costa Blanca's new build market, this development represents exceptional value for golf enthusiasts, investors, and anyone seeking the authentic Spanish lifestyle with all modern comforts included.

For the latest availability and pricing, please contact us belowâ€”units are selling quickly with Phase 1 completing December 2025 and Phase 2 in July 2026.

  • ðŸ“± WhatsApp us for instant answers

About Oasis Golf La Finca

Oasis Golf La Finca consists of 40 modern apartments designed in contemporary Mediterranean style, featuring clean white facades with elegant black architectural accents. The development is divided into two construction phases: Phase 1 with 20 units completing December 2025, and Phase 2 with an additional 20 units completing July 2026.

Built by Contrimar (Grupo Contrimar), a respected developer known for quality construction standards and on-time delivery, Oasis Golf La Finca showcases premium specifications throughout. Every apartment comes fully furnished with first-quality furniture and all appliances included, creating a genuine turnkey solution where you can move in with just your suitcase.

The development's design philosophy centers on maximizing outdoor living spacesâ€”whether that's through expansive private gardens for ground floor apartments (up to 264mÂ²) or generous roof solariums for top floor units (up to 108mÂ²). Combined with 27mÂ² covered terraces that extend each apartment's living space, residents enjoy the indoor-outdoor lifestyle that makes Costa Blanca living so desirable.

Location: Why La Finca Golf in Algorfa is Perfect for Your Costa Blanca Home

The La Finca Golf Lifestyle

La Finca Golf Resort is one of Costa Blanca South's most established and prestigious golf destinations. The 18-hole championship course, designed by Justo Vecino Quesada, offers challenging play for all abilities while winding through beautiful landscaping that showcases the region's natural beauty.

Living at La Finca Golf isn't just about golf accessâ€”though being able to walk to the first tee is certainly convenient. It's about becoming part of an established international community where English, Dutch, German, and Scandinavian residents mix with Spanish neighbors.

Proximity to Essential Amenities

Amenity Distance Travel Time
La Finca Golf Course On-site Walking distance
Guardamar Beaches 14 km 15 minutes drive
Alicante Airport 40 km 35 minutes drive
La Zenia Boulevard Shopping 20 km 20 minutes drive
Torrevieja University Hospital 20 km 20 minutes drive

Property Options at Oasis Golf La Finca

Property Type Bedrooms Interior Size Outdoor Space
Ground Floor with Garden 2 67-68mÂ² 27mÂ² terrace + up to 264mÂ² garden
Top Floor with Solarium 2 67-68mÂ² 27mÂ² terrace + 67-68mÂ² solarium
Ground Floor 3-Bed 3 86mÂ² 27mÂ² terrace + 179mÂ² garden

Contact us for current availability and pricing. Prices and unit availability change as properties are reserved.

2-Bedroom Ground Floor Apartments with Private Garden

The ground floor apartments at Oasis Golf La Finca offer something increasingly rare in modern developments: genuinely spacious private gardens. These units feature 67-68mÂ² of interior space with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, plus a 27mÂ² covered terrace that flows seamlessly into your private garden.

Garden sizes vary significantly depending on the specific unitâ€”the largest gardens reach an impressive 264mÂ², offering almost limitless possibilities for outdoor living.

Best for: Golf enthusiasts who want easy course access, families, pet owners, gardening lovers, those preferring single-level living.

2-Bedroom Top Floor Apartments with Private Solarium

For those who prioritize views and privacy, the top floor apartments deliver exceptional value. These units feature the same 67-68mÂ² interior layout with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, plus a 27mÂ² covered terrace on the main level. The real magic happens on the private roof solariumâ€”your own 67-68mÂ² outdoor space with panoramic golf course views.

Best for: Sun lovers, entertainers, buyers prioritizing views and privacy, investors (solariums are highly desirable for holiday rentals).

Features & Amenities

On-Site Facilities at Oasis Golf

Swimming Pool Complex: A large main pool offers ample space for swimming laps or relaxing on the water, while a separate children's pool provides a safe, shallow area for young ones to play.

Sports & Recreation Facilities:

  • Mini-Golf Course: A fun amenity for all ages
  • PÃ©tanque Court: Traditional lawn bowling, hugely popular in Spain
  • Outdoor Gym: Stay fit without gym membership fees

Property Features & Quality

Turnkey Convenience: Apartments come fully furnished with first-quality furniture selected by professional interior designers. All appliances are includedâ€”kitchen appliances, washing machine, and air conditioning.

Premium Kitchens: Contemporary design with high-quality white cabinetry and Coverlam Paladio porcelain countertopsâ€”extremely durable and heat-resistant.

Climate Control Systems: Every apartment includes ducted air conditioning throughout all roomsâ€”not just single-unit systems.

Investment at Oasis Golf La Finca

Additional Costs to Budget

When purchasing property in Spain, budget approximately 13-14% in additional costs:

Cost Type Percentage
IVA (Spanish VAT) 10%
AJD (Stamp Duty) ~1.5%
Notary & Legal fees ~2%

Financing Options

Spanish banks offer mortgages to international buyers. Non-EU residents can typically secure financing for up to 70% of the purchase price, while EU residents may qualify for up to 80%.

We work with Habeno, a specialized mortgage aggregator who can help you compare offers from multiple Spanish banks. Click here to start your mortgage application with Habeno.

Why Choose Oasis Golf La Finca?

  1. Frontline Golf Location at Competitive Pricing: Direct golf course views and access at exceptional value.
  2. Turnkey Convenience: Fully furnished with all appliances and ducted air conditioning.
  3. Contrimar's Proven Track Record: Quality developments delivered on time.
  4. Resort-Style Amenities: Pool, gym, mini-golf, pÃ©tanque court included in community fees.
  5. Generous Outdoor Spaces: Gardens up to 264mÂ² or solariums up to 108mÂ².
  6. Near-Term Completion: Phase 1 December 2025, Phase 2 July 2026.

Frequently Asked Questions

When will Oasis Golf La Finca be completed?

Phase 1 is scheduled for completion in December 2025, while Phase 2 will complete in July 2026. Contrimar has a strong track record of meeting completion dates, and current construction is progressing on schedule.

What is included in the purchase price?

The purchase price includes your fully furnished apartment with all furniture and appliances, ducted air conditioning throughout, motorized window blinds, LED lighting package, one surface parking space, one outdoor storage room, and access to all communal facilities.

Is mortgage financing available for international buyers?

Yes, Spanish banks offer mortgages to international buyers. Non-EU residents can typically finance up to 70% of the purchase price, while EU residents may qualify for up to 80% financing. We partner with Habeno, a mortgage aggregator specializing in non-resident financing.

Can I use the property for holiday rentals?

Yes, holiday rentals are permitted at Oasis Golf La Finca. The golf resort location attracts year-round rental demand from golf enthusiasts across Europe. Several local property management companies offer full rental management services.

How do I reserve a property at Oasis Golf La Finca?

Contact us via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970, phone, or our contact form to discuss available units and receive the latest pricing. You'll review floor plans, select your preferred apartment, and pay a reservation deposit to secure the unit while contracts are prepared.

What are the ongoing community fees?

Community fees are estimated at â‚¬40-60 per month for 2-bedroom apartments. These fees cover pool maintenance, garden upkeep, communal area cleaning, insurance, water for common areas, and general administration.
